subject: Body, Mind, Heart, Gut, Spirit Checklist.
credit: Body, Mind, Heart, Gut, Spirit Checklist.

todos.title: Mental Training
todos.body: Do you train mental strength (resilience)?

todos.title: Stress
todos.body: Do you respond rationally in stressful situations?

todos.title: Analysis Paralysis
todos.body: Do you get paralyzed by tough decisions or do you know how to work through them?

todos.title: Emotional Stress
todos.body: Can you think of a time when you were angry but were able to quickly let it go?

todos.title: Focus
todos.body: Can you focus during stressful situations?

todos.title: Eating
todos.body: Are you conscious of what you eat and drink?

todos.title: Intimacy
todos.body: Is it easy for you to be intimate and open in relationships?

todos.title: Listen
todos.body: In your last few conversations did you listen more than you spoke?  Can you think of three times in the past week where you listened to someone else?

todos.title: Values
todos.body: In a moment of crisis do you think about your personal values and stick to them?

todos.title: Perseverance
todos.body: Do you persevere when faced with a challenge or give up/get bogged down?

todos.title: Big Picture
todos.body: Do you look at the big picture and avoid getting caught up on small things?

todos.title: Triggers
todos.body: Do you know what triggers your emotions?

todos.title: Expression
todos.body: Do you have a way to express your emotions in a healthy and productive manner?

todos.title: Gym
todos.body: Do you have a specified training regimen?

todos.title: Purpose
todos.body: Do you have a clear purpose for your actions?

todos.title: Peace
todos.body: Do you find yourself at peace with yourself and do you have high esteem for yourself?

todos.title: Fulfilling
todos.body: Do you feel your life is full of value?

todos.title: Present
todos.body: Do you feel present in the moment?

todos.title: Insights
todos.body: Do you acknowledge intuitive insights or brush them off?

todos.title: Reactions
todos.body: Can you keep your emotions from causing you to make actions or decisions that you later regret?

todos.title: Objective
todos.body: Can you easily tell the difference between facts and interpretation?

todos.title: Awareness
todos.body: Can you describe the clothing and appearance of three strangers you met this morning?

todos.title: Sacrifices
todos.body: Are you willing to make sacrifices to achieve your goals?

todos.title: Judgment
todos.body: Are you slow to pass judgment and not quick to jump to conclusions?

todos.title: Illness/Injury
todos.body: Are you generally free from illness or injury?

todos.title: Physically Stable
todos.body: Are you able to stand and sit for long periods without discomfort?
